member.name: T:SocialCommunicationsApi.Controllers.SocialCommunicationsController
member.summary: Chat Application Api Controller, This is an only one end point for this (Chat Application Api) --> Action Differed on Api Action Enums, Application Controller Name "SocialCommunication". Has an Api Auth Key Validation.

member.summary: This is the end Point of the "SocialCommunication" Controller.
member.remarks: Input Cannot be null and any Exception can return the Common output Model with Error, StackTrace, InnerException details.
